heading: just do it
subheading: contrary to what coaches have been telling you forever, if you're an athlete you should definitely have sex before the big game. this wisdom comes to us from an italian researcher, who maintains that more testosterone -- the hormone related to both sex and aggression -- is produced after a man has sex. since aggression is prized on the athletic field, it stands to reason that the sexually active competitor is a force to be reckoned with. from what history tells us, this theory was apparently lost on the italian army.
author: wired staff
